title: China-U.S. Tension Mars Biotech Giant BeiGene’s Shanghai Debut
sub_head: Goldman-sponsored deal is the largest healthcare IPO of 2021
body:
Chinese biotechnology firm BeiGene Ltd. tumbled 16% in its mainland trading debut, after raising $3.5 billion and becoming the first company to be triple-listed in New York, Hong Kong and on Shanghai’s STAR Market.
The most senior banks, or sponsors, for the onshore initial public offering were China International Capital Corp. and Goldman Sachs Gao Hua Securities, the Chinese unit of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. It is the first IPO to be sponsored by a U.S. bank in China’s domestic A-share market.
